data.text: I literally had 5 kids in my car today playing games on my Tesla. All of them were amazed that a car could have games, farting sounds and Netflix all in one. @tesla made one of those products that makes you proud to own. https://t.co/Sz7S19rOtb
How long is acceptable to all sit in the car playing games 🤣🤣 🎮 This car is amazing #tesla #beachbuggyracing2 https://t.co/5wgP22mutT

Compartiendo un momento único con vosotros.
250.000 km en un Tesla Model S 85 de 7 años y 10 meses con la batería original al 90% 😍😍💪💪
¡Feliz!🤩🤩
@ClubTeslaES @Tesla @elonmusk https://t.co/u8z5Xq7jfc
Love powering my car and house with the ☀️.  @elonmusk @Tesla https://t.co/5Xn3OCvrk0

After 3 years of ownership, and over 1000 x 5 ⭐️ @Uber rides given, my spaceship is still light years ahead of anything else on the road. My passengers & I love it! Thank you for the joy @tesla & @elonmusk! ⚡️ ⚡️ https://t.co/GmM4daLKXY

Reto conseguido! Monza-Barcelona-Badajoz. 2263 km, 15,4 kWh/100 km, 349 kWh (105 euros).
Viento, lluvia, maletas, patinete, lujazo de piloto... no puedo pedir más. Feliz.
Ahora a pensar en el siguiente, Nordkapp!! 🤪 https://t.co/zrOBVWbMub https://t.co/tz51mHWkTU
Don’t pinch me because I must be dreaming 🤩 I’m still in disbelief that I have my very own original Tesla Roadster 🤯 https://t.co/gZLvf6hF2A
White #Tesla seats after 3 years, 50k miles, and lots of butts in seats. These are all natural, no crazy coatings applied. https://t.co/kVJd9oK5lh

Here she is! I named her, Rover!
Only ~2 months ago I set the goal of owning a Tesla, and now I do! This journey is incredible, and it’s only getting started! I don’t even know what to say, it’s surreal. Thank you everyone for the support along the way ❤️🔋 https://t.co/qWGpabVqQy
